abstract_ssm: This collection contains several monthly issues of from the years 1988 and 1989, occurring in chronological order and housed in one manuscript box. 1988 issues are from January, May, July/August, October, and November, while 1989 issues are from February, March, July/August, September, and October. Issues dating from July/August 1989 forward feature the title on their cover pages.
